item.description:
I know it seems like we're going to Northwest Park a lot lately, but it's convenient for me and now that it's staying light and we can do some things on weeknights after work, I want to take advantage. I promise to post some other locations soon, this is just what works for me this week!

The weather looks to be good on Tuesday and we'll have a couple of hours of daylight, so let's explore a trail at Northwest Park that the group has not yet hiked -- there are a couple!

As always on my hikes, leashed dogs and kids are welcome, though I won't have either with me this time!

Park website is at www.northwestpark.org for directions and such.

=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
----------------------------------------------------------------
item.how_to_find_us: Meet me in the parking lot at 5:00. I drive a red Taurus wagon (that is, if it hasn't died on me yet!)
